name: eBusinessAppraisals.com
overview:
eBusinessAppraisals.com is a collaborative effort to educate business owners through affordable business appraisal and business valuation products and advice.

Our work bridges the gap between ineffective, cookie-cutter software and high-ticket business valuation services offered by accounting and mergers & acquisition firms. We offer business leaders with limited budgets access to the information they need to make smart business decisions about everything from growth planning to how much their executives should be paid.

With decades of valuation experience and thousands of business valuation completed worth billions of dollars in fair market value, our valuations experts have seen it all. Our proprietary approach allows us to offer this expertise to businesses of all revenue ranges.

Our services include custom and affordable business appraisals for your different needs:

  • Success benchmarking
  • Buying a business
  • Considering the right exit strategy
  • Retirement planning
  • Determining executive compensation
  • Offering Employment Stock Option Plan (ESOP)
  • Tax Planning
  • Estate Planning
  • Selling your business
  • Filing bankruptcy
  • Preparing for Litigation
